<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Quickmelt Slick](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1516)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clay jar is filled with a warm fluid composed primarily of [lagofir](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1777) oil and natural fire retardants. You can pour the fluid in an empty area adjacent to you, or over an adjacent frozen object, with an Interact action. The fluid instantly melts non-magical ice and snow in the area and harmlessly vaporizes the resulting meltwater. When used to melt magical ice and snow, quickmelt slick attempts a [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) check with the listed counteract modifier to melt the ice and snow, using the source of that ice and snow to determine the counteract level and DC.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs=""
>
Quickmelt Slick (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 5 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Lesser quickmelt slick melts ice and snow up to 1 foot in depth in one 5-foot square, or melts the ice covering a Small or smaller object. The slick has a +6 modifier for the counteract check and a counteract level of 1.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 4"
pfs=""
>
Quickmelt Slick (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 13 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Moderate quickmelt slick melts ice and snow up to 2 feet in depth in two adjacent 5-foot squares, or melts the ice covering a Medium or smaller object. The slick has a +8 modifier for the counteract check and a counteract level of 2.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs=""
>
Quickmelt Slick (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 78</row>

**Price** 310 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

Greater quickmelt slick melts ice and snow up to 5 feet in depth in a 10-foot-square area or melts the ice covering a Large or smaller object. The slick has a +19 modifier for the counteract check and a counteract level of 6.
